::DrillBit::

DrillBit watched Megatron threten the Maximal. He walked over to
Terrorsaur and KitKat.
"How did it start acid raining?" He asked. He was also looking KitKat,
in the eye. After all this fighting, he had a idea of how to relax...,
he woundered if it could be called that.
